statements: SELECT * FROM CustomerOrders ORDER BY order_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, total_amount FROM CustomerOrders WHERE customer_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM CustomerOrders WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT order_id, shipping_address FROM CustomerOrders ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT customer_id, order_date FROM CustomerOrders WHERE total_amount <= 500;
SELECT customer_id, total_amount, shipping_address FROM CustomerOrders WHERE order_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY total_amount DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM CustomerOrders WHERE customer_id = 100 ORDER BY order_date ASC
SELECT DISTINCT customer_id FROM CustomerOrders WHERE total_amount > 1000
SELECT order_id, order_date FROM CustomerOrders WHERE shipping_address LIKE '%California%'
SELECT customer_id, SUM(total_amount) AS total_spent FROM CustomerOrders GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_spent > 5000 ORDER BY total_spent DESC
SELECT * FROM orders;
SELECT customer_id, order_date FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 100;
SELECT order_id, total_amount FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM orders JOIN transactions ON orders.order_id = transactions.order_id;
SELECT * FROM orders JOIN transactions ON orders.order_id = transactions.order_id WHERE orders.total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY orders.order_date DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT transactions.transaction_date, orders.total_amount FROM orders LEFT JOIN transactions ON orders.order_id = transactions.order_id WHERE orders.customer_id = 'ef3d12b2-9e4b-4c7e-8e11-4c0fa9ad3b39' ORDER BY transactions.amount ASC LIMIT 10

SELECT orders.order_id, COUNT(transactions.transaction_id) AS transaction_count FROM orders LEFT JOIN transactions ON orders.order_id = transactions.order_id GROUP BY orders.order_id HAVING transaction_count > 2 ORDER BY transaction_count DESC

SELECT orders.customer_id, SUM(transactions.amount) AS total_spent FROM orders JOIN transactions ON orders.order_id = transactions.order_id GROUP BY orders.customer_id HAVING total_spent > 5000 ORDER BY total_spent DESC

SELECT orders.order_date, AVG(transactions.amount) AS avg_transaction_amount FROM orders JOIN transactions ON orders.order_id = transactions.order_id GROUP BY orders.order_date ORDER BY orders.order_date
SELECT * FROM CustomerOrders;
SELECT customer_id, order_id FROM CustomerOrders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, customer_id FROM Transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT analysis_id, order_id, transaction_id FROM RPAAnalysis WHERE analysis_result = 'approved' ORDER BY order_id ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) as total_orders FROM CustomerOrders;
SELECT * FROM CustomerOrders WHERE customer_id = 1 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, order_date FROM CustomerOrders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(order_id) AS total_orders FROM CustomerOrders GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY total_orders DESC;
SELECT t.transaction_id, c.customer_id, t.amount FROM Transactions t INNER JOIN CustomerOrders c ON t.customer_id = c.customer_id WHERE t.amount > 1000 ORDER BY t.amount DESC;

SELECT a.analysis_id, a.analysis_result, c.customer_id FROM RPAAnalysis a JOIN CustomerOrders c ON a.order_id = c.order_id JOIN Transactions t ON a.transaction_id = t.transaction_id WHERE a.analysis_result LIKE '%successful%' ORDER BY c.customer_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_orders
SELECT customer_id, order_date, order_amount FROM customer_orders WHERE order_id = 10
SELECT customer_name, address, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 100
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products ORDER BY unit_price DESC
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM customer_orders ORDER BY order_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE address LIKE '%Street%' ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT order_id, order_amount, transaction_amount FROM customer_orders JOIN transactions ON customer_orders.order_id = transactions.order_id WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';

SELECT customer_name, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_spent FROM customers JOIN customer_orders ON customers.customer_id = customer_orders.customer_id JOIN transactions ON customer_orders.order_id = transactions.order_id GROUP BY customer_name ORDER BY total_spent DESC;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products WHERE unit_price > 100 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT order_id, order_date, order_total FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM products WHERE product_price > 100;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, transaction_amount, transaction_status FROM transactions WHERE transaction_status = 'completed';
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_address LIKE '%Street%' ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT customer_name, order_date, order_total, order_status FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id WHERE order_total > 1000 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, product_description, product_price FROM products WHERE product_price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY product_price;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_status = 'Completed' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
